resources.string: Is this the correct way to wash your car?
Does this image show us the right thing to do?
Is it okay to bathe your pets in a public water body?
Once formed, lakes do not stay the same. Like people, they go through different life stagesâ€”youth, maturity, old age, and death.
There are 117 million lakes on Earth, covering 3.7 percent of the continental land surface.
Lake Superior is the largest freshwater lake in the world by surface area.
Lakes contain mostly freshwater, though some are salty.
Lakes can form in interesting different ways such as in the craters of volcanoes, by sinkholes in the ground, or even artificially by dams made by man.
The Dead Sea in Israel is the world\'s lowest lake at 1,371 feet below sea level
The highest lake in the world is Ojos del Salado at 20,965 feet high. It is located in a crater in the Andes Mountains on the border between Chile and Argentina.
